summary:
Mod adds "Lara" from the game Tomb raider 2013 as race and companion.
Now in English.
descriptionHtml:
The mod adds new race "Lara" and companion. Model of head fully taken from the game. Made on the basis of breton race. [color=#ffe599][size=4][u][b]Companion can be found in the bannered mare[/b][/u][/size][/color].

[color=#93c47d][size=5]Features[/size][/color]:
[list]
[*]Work mophs.
[*]Have is two new hair.
[*]UNPB body.
[*]The ability to remove clothes and put on.
[*]Custom voice on english.
[*]Two jewelry.
[/list]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]Bugs[/size][/color]:
[color=#ff0000](please report bugs)[/color]
[list]
[*]Some helmets will fall through the head.
[/list]          [color=#dbb0a7]This is due to the model of the head. Since the models of headgear a lot I will not fix it[/color].

[list]
[*]The clothing disappears from the companion after leaving the location.
[/list]         [color=#dbb0a7] Solution: come out and come back[/color].

[list]
[*]If you have dark eyes.
[/list]         [color=#dbb0a7] It is connected maybe with enb.Try turning it off[/color].

[list]
[*]If you can not select hair for editing in sculpting mode.
[/list]          [color=#dbb0a7]There are no "TRI" files. You need to create it and specify the path to the corresponding "tri" file in the "ESP" for the hair[/color]. [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72436/?tab=bugs]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72436/?tab=bugs[/url]
[color=#ffd966][size=4]
Abbreviations[/size][/color]:
[list=1]
[*][color=#ff00ff][b]NCV[/b][/color] - No Custom Voice only VANILLA.
[*][color=#ff00ff][b]ECV[/b][/color] - English Custom Voice.
[*][color=#ff00ff][b]RCV[/b][/color] - Russian Cutom Voice.
[*][color=#ff00ff][b]NCV-E[/b][/color] - No Custom Voice only VANILLA in english.
[*][color=#ff00ff][b]NCV-R[/b][/color] - No Custom Voice only VANILLA in russian.
[/list]

[color=#ffe599][size=4]Recommendations[/size][/color][color=#fff2cc]:[/color]
[list]
[*]   [color=#1155cc][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?tab=description]Face Light[/url]﻿[/color]
[/list]
[color=#3c78d8][size=3][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]:
   Translation by klagetwer.
   Hair by konradm96 from deviantart.
   UNP BLESSED BODY by Blessed Redux Project team.
   RaceMenu by Expired.
   SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa.
 [color=#999999]  [/color][s][color=#666666]I by my mom[/color][/s]
   Thanks Crystal Dynamics for excellent game and GoogleTranslate for translate.
author: KotVshope and klagetwer
